lg.l: It’s heaven, just to walk this land
You and me, hand in hand
It’s heaven, when you smile at me
Heaven is to be set free.
No Government, no Constitution
No armament, no pollution,
No violence for self-protection
No power trips for satisfaction
Rain forest isn’t just a name
Killing skills is not a game,
Building jails, is no solution
It’s time for inner revolution.
Not you and me against the others
For heaven’s sakes, aren’t we all brothers?
Each one alone, deep in your heart,
To look for bliss, that’s where you start.
Heaven, is to be set free
To watch your face smile at me,
You and I, hand in hand
Walking in the Promised Land.
